description: This file defines a mock class PersistentStoreImplementationMock for unit testing, which implements multiple interfaces related to a persistent storage system, including methods for storing, retrieving, and managing key-value data and cache controls.

classes.name: PersistentStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of storage-related interfaces for unit testing purposes.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration of a notification callback.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks the unregistration of a notification callback.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a key-value pair in a namespace, with support for different scopes and TTL.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value for a key within a namespace.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deleting a specific key within a namespace.

methods.name: Register (overload for IStore2)
methods.description: Mocks registering a notification callback for IStore2.

methods.name: Unregister (overload for IStore2)
methods.description: Mocks unregistering a notification callback for IStore2.

methods.name: SetValue (overload for IStore2)
methods.description: Mocks setting a value with scope, namespace, key, value, and TTL for IStore2.

methods.name: GetValue (overload for IStore2)
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value with scope, namespace, key, and TTL for IStore2.

methods.name: DeleteKey (overload for IStore2)
methods.description: Mocks deleting a key with scope for IStore2.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace (overload for IStore2)
methods.description: Mocks deleting a namespace with scope for IStore2.

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Mocks retrieving keys within a scope and namespace.

methods.name: GetNamespaces
methods.description: Mocks retrieving namespaces within a scope.

methods.name: GetStorageSizes
methods.description: Mocks retrieving storage sizes within a scope.

methods.name: GetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks retrieving storage limit for a namespace.

methods.name: SetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks setting storage limit for a namespace.
